meToolkit 0.1.0

Reference

All functions

buildColorPalette()

Build Color Palette

build_me_app()

Build ME app from data

calcRrCi()

Calculate risk ratio confidence interval

checkGenomeFile()

Checks genome input dataframe for correct form

checkPhenomeFile()

Check uploaded phenome file for correctness

checkPhewasFile()

Check uploaded phewas file for correctness

codeFilter()

Filter codes.

data_loader()

Server function of upset module

data_loader_UI()

UI function of upset module

deleteCodes()

Delete Phecodes from a selected phecodes list with warning.

detect_id_column()

Detect Id column in data

gather_snp_annotations()

Gather snp annotation information

info_panel()

SNP info panel: Server function

info_panel_UI()

SNP info panel: UI function

invertCodes()

Invert currently selected codes Only inverts codes that were not preivously inverted. If a code is 'inverted' after it's already inverted it simple reverts back to normal.

isolateCodes()

Isolate currently viewed codes

main_dashboard()

Main Multimorbidity Explorer Dashboard: Server function

main_dashboard_UI()

Main Multimorbidity Explorer Dashboard: UI function

makeDescriptionPalette()

Create Description Color Palette

makeNetworkData()

Convert phenotype dataframe to a data list that works with network plotting functions

manhattan_plot_and_table()

Server function of manhattan plot module.

manhattan_plot_and_table_UI()

Interactive manhattan plot and table

mergePhenomeGenome()

Merge a tidy phenome dataframe with a tidy genome(single snp) genome dataframe.

network_plot()

Server function of snp info panel

network_plot_UI()

Interactive individual-level data network diagram of patients to codes

normalizePhecode()

Normalize a phecode vector to padded character

pretty_popup()

Reveal hidden element

reconcile_data()

Combine and reconcile the three main data components needed for ME app and return in app-friendly format

reveal_element()

Reveal hidden element

run_me()

Run ME app locally

simIndividualData()

Generate sample individual level data based upon some phewas results

simPhewasResults()

Simulate PheWAS results

subsetToCodes()

Subset phenotype data to a given list of phecodes

upset()

Server function of upset module

upset_UI()

UI function of upset module

use_pretty_popup()

Use pretty popup function

use_reveal_element()

Use reveal_element function
